message.body: Hi Gabi! Were you a yes or no for that August 16th gig? You could be a cop! It's pretty easy and you would be done by 8.
O! I didnt think i could but i can. So yes
Yay!!! I'm so happy. This party is really fancy and the hosts want the cops to be men. We need a bouncer too. All I have is you & Richard so we need two more. Know anyone who would be good?
Oh btw. When she pointed out styles that she liked, this was the pic she sent! ï¿¼
You could be the club owner too if you prefer that....are you free at all next week for like an hour to discuss? I can't remember your travel plans
Ill be in town Tuesday an Thursday evening this week and then next weekend too
Oh perfect! Tuesday or Thursday evening we were thinking to get together and go over details and costumes
